thread.title: 'Sainsbury's offer to save £60 on first five shops has backfired'
thread.title_full: 'Sainsbury's offer to save £60 on first five shops has backfired'

author: Jessica Gorst-Williams
title: 'Sainsbury's offer to save £60 on first five shops has backfired'
text: 'Sainsbury’s offer to save £60 on first five shops has backfired' Confusion over an online shopping discount sent one lifelong Sainsbury shopper heading to Lidl Small print: vouchers for money off online shopping delivery often have to be used within a fixed time period
